allow: Bash(python3 -c " import json, sys data = json.load\(sys.stdin\) for item in data: if ''text'' in item: parsed = json.loads\(item[''text'']\) nodes = parsed.get\(''data'',{}\).get\(''searchDocs'',{}\).get\(''nodes'',[]\) for n in nodes: print\(''=== TITLE:'', n.get\(''title'',''''\)\) print\(''HREF:'', n.get\(''href'',''''\)\) content = n.get\(''content'',''''\) # Print first 500 chars of content print\(''CONTENT \(first 500\):'', content[:500]\) subs = n.get\(''subsections'',{}\).get\(''nodes'',[]\) if n.get\(''subsections''\) else [] for s in subs: print\('' SUB:'', s.get\(''title'',''''\)\) print\(\) ")
